journal.name: Rate Your Knowledge: What do you know about Formative Assessment?
journal.intro:
Let us know what you know about Formative Assessment. Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) about your understanding of Formative Assessment, and tell us if you consider yourself a...
- Formative Assessment Expert--You apply the principles of formative assessment to your teaching every day;
- Formative Assessment Novice--You consider the principles of formative assessment and are learning more about it all the time;
- Formative Assessment Newbie--The term formative assessment and the formative assessment guidelines are still new to you.
